        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The blocks light opacity

      • findNearestStructure

        @Nullable
public SMCBlockPos findNearestStructure(java.lang.String type,
                                                   SMCBlockPos startingPos,
                                                   boolean findUnexplored)
        Similar to `/locate` command
        Parameters:
        type - structure type. Might be "Stronghold", "Monument", "Village", "Mansion", "EndCity", "Fortress", "Temple" or "Mineshaft"
        startingPos - position where to start search from. Method will try to find nearest strtucture to this position
        findUnexplored - find structures which are not generated yet
        Returns:
